trustfund: TF029530-PHRD-SOCIAL SECTOR REFORM(BANK-EXECUTED),TF025495-PHRD-HEALTH CARE REFORM PROJECT,TF029520-PHRD-SECONDARY EDUCATION PROJ.

abstracts.cdata!:
The Health System Reform Loan Project
            helps implement the government's health system reform,
            focusing on modernizing IMSS (the Mexican Social Security
            Institute for Private Sector Employees). The reform will 1)
            improve the financial management of the health insurance
            system to ensure financial transparency; 2) introduce new
            resource allocation and financial mechanisms to improve
            efficiency and limit the fiscal impact of the proposed
            reforms; 3) strengthen the institutional and regulatory
            framework for health insurance to extend coverage to the
            self-employed and informal sector workers; 4) ensure greater
            transparency and accountability among providers; 5) develop
            measures for quality assurance and user rights, and to
            facilitate user choice; and 6) improve the quality and
            efficiency of the IMSS health delivery system by supporting
            decentralized decisionmaking, restructuring the health care
            delivery network around a population-based system, and
            introducing performance-based incentives for providers. The
            reform program adopts a two-pronged approach. It develops
            and implements health insurance financing reforms and the
            necessary regulatory framework by a) separating financing
            from service provision, increasing user choice and extending
            coverage, and developing and implementing purchasing
            mechanisms; and b) institutionally strengthening IMSS by
            changing its corporate structure for health services
            administration, and strengthening its health care delivery network.
